reviewText: This DVD was ok. I did not care too much for the interviews that they showed throughout the video. The picture seem fake or the lighting was not good. They performed, but something was off somewhat did not seem live to me maybe because they were on stage in Las Vegas at some bar or something. It was ok to watch but nothing I want to see over again like some other performers I have reviewed.

reviewText: Very good concert.  They played all the good hits.  It would have been nice to have the concert recorded in HD format.  The sound is good.  The picture quality could have been better.  SUMMARY:  A very good show! Good Things Come To Those Who Wait!!!

reviewText: OooooWeeee!!! Just say yes... If you're not in Love, after watching this video you will be.  Lawd How Mercy.  The brothers can still croon.  Once you see this concert you'll think you were right there in the place singing along.  So many of their hit songs and they also take you back aways.  I really can't find the words to explain, you have to get your very own copy.  I guarantee you'll say "SOUND SO BEAUTIFUL DON'T YOU AGREE"  Thank you Whispers, as always you put it down once again.LYNN IN OKC

reviewText: always been a huge fan of the Whispers and live they still are bringing the pain. stepping and the Sanging is tops. the Brothers ain't lost a thing. all the hits and they are giving you even more. the Whispers have that balance in this show of the classic Grooves and Slow Jams. a must watch.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I've seen The Whispers many times, live in concert, and they've never disappointed me-ever. They're always well prepared, sound great, look even better(well dressed), the band is exceptional as always. This DVD Concert is no exception. It's just a great concert. They're steepin' all over the place. And the singing, wow!!! My one disappointment is, they only did one song from their last cd, entitled "For Your Ears Only "  and that song was "Butta" . However, they put a hurt on that song.  I highly recommend this DVD. It's worth 10 stars. By the way, their latest cd," For Your Ears Only " is exceptional. It's as good as anything they've ever done.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This was a great concert of a truly classic group of professional entertainers. The songs were very well selected. The interaction with the audience was personal and very funny. Although some of the conversations were adult in nature, they were presented with good taste. The only shortcoming with this concert was the poor video quality of the production. Perhaps it was the lack of technology available at that time. It would have been great to have this on Blu-Ray.Overall, the DVD is a nice addition to your video library. This is particularly true during these days of extremely high concert ticket prices, excess traffic and parking fees. I attended their last concert in Boston three years ago and unfortunately, one of the twin brothers did not perform due to a serious illness. As these great performers begin to age, it becomes even more important to take every opportunity to purchase their DVD's and CD's to keep these memories alive!!

reviewText: My husband and I just love this DVD, despite the fact that we agree that it was not filmed by an industry professional. The Whispers prove to still have the goods and give a fabulous and very solid performance. In the past few years, I have witnessed countless performances that have had top of the line production (great sound, great lighting, etc), yet the performer's talent  proves to be very disappointing..I recommend this DVD to anyone who can appreciate a great performance..
